description: Single storey side to rear extension; alterations to rear dormer; alterations to garage roof; conversion of garage to habitable room with installation of window to front; external alterations (demolition of rear extension)
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:</p><ul><li>Site Location Plan entitled Planning Portal Ref No: PP-12445150v1;</li><li>Existing and Proposed Block Plan entitled Drawing No: VAHID-08-PL04;</li><li>Existing and Proposed Elevations and Sections entitled Drawing No: VAHID-08-PL03;</li><li>Proposed Floor and Roof Plans entitled Drawing No: VAHID-08-PL02;</li><li>Flood Risk Assessment report Ref: LE2023395FRA;</li></ul>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the side elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The flat roof area of the single storey side/rear extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension, the alterations to the dormer and windows hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building and/or specified materials within the submission documents.

The
development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three
years from the date of this permission.
